<body bgcolor="#ffffff" style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><br><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">SENIOR EXECUTIVE
AGREEMENT</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">THIS
SENIOR EXECUTIVE AGREEMENT (the <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#8220;Agreement&#8221;</font>)&#160;&#160;by
and between ON ASSIGNMENT, INC., a Delaware corporation (the<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"> &#8220;Company&#8221;</font>) and PETER T.
DAMERIS (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#8220;Executive&#8221;</font>) is
entered into on November 4, 2009.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Recitals</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">A.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
The Company and Executive previously entered into an agreement, dated October
27, 2003, pursuant to which Executive is employed as the Chief Executive Officer
and President of the Company (as amended on December 14, 2006 and as Amended and
Restated on December 11, 2008, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Prior
Agreement</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">B.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
The Company and Executive wish to enter into a new agreement, effective January
1, 2010 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Effective
Date</font>&#8221;) pursuant to which Executive will continue his employment as the
Chief Executive Officer and President of the Company under the terms and
conditions set forth herein.&#160;&#160;The Prior Agreement shall continue to
govern all compensation paid or payable to Executive under that Prior Agreement,
including the 2006 Equity Awards (as defined in that Prior Agreement), while the
Agreement shall govern all compensation paid or payable to Executive under the
Agreement.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">C.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Certain
definitions are set forth in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section 4</font> of this
Agreement.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Agreement</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
parties hereto agree as follows:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Employment</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font> &#160;The Company hereby
engages Executive to continue to serve as the Chief Executive Officer and
President of the Company, and Executive agrees to continue to serve the Company,
during the Service Term (as defined in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section 1(f)</font> hereof)
in the capacities, and subject to the terms and conditions, set forth in this
Agreement.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 126pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Services</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160; </font>During the
Service Term, Executive, as Chief Executive Officer and President of the
Company, shall have all the duties and responsibilities customarily rendered by
Chief Executive Officers and Presidents of companies of similar size and nature
and as may be reasonably assigned from time to time by the Board (as defined
below).&#160;&#160;Executive will report directly to the
Board.&#160;&#160;Executive will devote his best efforts and substantially all
of his business time and attention (except for vacation periods and periods of
illness or other incapacity) to the business of the Company and its
Affiliates.&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding the foregoing, and provided that such
activities do not interfere with the fulfillment of Executive&#8217;s obligations
hereunder, Executive may (A)&#160;serve as an officer, director or trustee of
any charitable or non-profit entity; (B) own a passive investment in any private
company and own up to 5% of the outstanding voting securities of any public
company; or (C) with the prior approval of the Board, serve as a director of up
to two other companies so long as such companies do not compete with the Company
and Executive notifies the Board in advance of accepting any such
position.&#160;&#160;Unless the Company and Executive agree to the contrary,
Executive&#8217;s place of employment shall be at the Company&#8217;s principal executive
offices in Calabasas, California; <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">provided</font>,<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic"> however</font>, that Executive
shall be permitted under the terms of this Agreement, upon conditions approved
by the Board, to relocate his principal residence to Texas and to perform his
duties and responsibilities under this Agreement from such <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">location and commute from
time to time to the Company&#8217;s principal executive offices so long as such
relocation does</font> not materially interfere with Executive&#8217;s satisfactory
performance of his duties and responsibilities under this Agreement and, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">provided</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">further</font>, that Executive will
travel to such other locations as may be reasonably </font></div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">necessary
in order to discharge his duties and responsibilities
hereunder.&#160;&#160;Executive shall have the right to attend all meetings of
the Board of Directors of the Company <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">and will be nominated for
election as a director for each term for which he is eligible to serve during
the Service Term</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 126pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Salary, Bonus and
Benefits</font>.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 162pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Salary
and Bonus</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">During the Service Term,
effective from and after January 1, 2010, the Company will pay Executive a base
salary (the &#8220;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Annual
Base Salary</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#8221;)
as the Board may designate from time to time, at the rate of not less than
$635,250 per annum; </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">provided,
however,</font> <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">that
the Annual Base Salary shall be subject to review by the Board for upward
increases annually during the first quarter of each calendar year of the Service
Term, with any such upward increases having retroactive effect to January 1 of
the year to which such increases apply.&#160;&#160;</font>With respect to
calendar year 2010 and thereafter during the Service Term, Executive will be
eligible to receive an annual bonus in an amount of up to 120% of Executive&#8217;s
Annual Base Salary for each fiscal year, as determined by the Compensation
Committee of the Board of Directors (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Compensation Committee</font>&#8221;) based
upon the Company&#8217;s achievement of budgetary and other objectives set by the
Compensation Committee after review of a financial performance plan that is
prepared by Executive and recommended to the Compensation
Committee.&#160;&#160;Such annual bonus opportunity shall be comprised of (A) a
60% bonus opportunity applicable to achievement of plan targets that are a
combination of targets for revenue and EBITDA (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Component A</font>&#8221;), and (B) an
additional 60% bonus opportunity (thereby making the total annual bonus
opportunity 120% of Executive&#8217;s Annual Base Salary) for performance exceeding
plan targets based upon revenue and EBITDA performance (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Component B</font>&#8221; and, together
with Component A, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Annual
Bonus</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The performance targets for Component A and Component
B may be revised in future years by the Compensation Committee after
consultation with Executive.&#160;&#160;Within 90 days of the beginning of each
calendar year during the Service Term, the Compensation Committee will
determine, after consultation with Executive, the targets applicable to the
Annual Bonuses based on the Company&#8217;s performance plan.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;All
performance plan targets will be defined in terms that exclude the effects of
any nonrecurring charges, including without limitation, charges related to
goodwill write-offs, acquisitions, dispositions or changes in accounting
treatment.&#160;&#160;The annual bonus, if any, shall be due and payable to
Executive, in cash, on or prior to March 15 of the year immediately following
that in which such annual bonus is earned (for the avoidance of doubt, this
deadline is intended to comply with the &#8220;short-term deferral&#8221; exemption from the
application of Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended
(the &#8220;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Code</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#8221;)).</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 162pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Benefits</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.</font>&#160; During the Service
Term, Executive shall be entitled to participate in and shall receive all
benefits under pension benefit plans provided by the Company (including without
limitation participation in any Company incentive, savings and retirement plans,
practices, policies and programs) to the extent applicable generally to other
peer executives of the Company.&#160; In addition, during the Service Term,
Executive and/or Executive&#8217;s family shall be entitled to participate and shall
receive all benefits under welfare plans provided by the Company (including
without limitation medical prescriptions, dental, disability, employee life,
group life, accidental life and travel accident insurance plans and plans) to
the extent and on the same basis applicable generally to other peer executives
of the Company.&#160; Executive shall be reimbursed for customary travel and
other expenses, subject to standard and reasonable documentation
requirements.&#160; In addition, Executive will receive a stipend of $450 per
month for lease of an automobile and other related expenses during the Service
Term, payable in equal monthly increments during the Service Term.&#160;
Executive shall also be eligible to receive four weeks paid vacation </font><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">per
annum.&#160;&#160;Any unused vacation time during each fiscal year shall be
&#8220;rolled-over&#8221; to the following fiscal year to the extent permitted by the
Company&#8217;s policies for other senior executives of the Company.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 81pt; TEXT-INDENT: 81pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 162pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(iii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Long-Term
Incentive Awards</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">.&#160;&#160;&#160;</font>The Company
shall grant the awards identified in this Section 1(b)(iii) (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">LTIP Awards</font>&#8221;) to Executive at
the times and subject to the terms and conditions set forth below, pursuant to
either (1) the Company&#8217;s Restated 1987 Stock Option Plan, as amended from time
to time (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Existing
Plan</font>&#8221;), or (2) an incentive plan adopted by the Company and approved by
its shareholders subsequent to the Effective Date that provides for the grant of
awards constituting &#8220;qualified performance-based compensation&#8221; (within the
meaning of Code Section 162(m)) based on the attainment of the performance
criteria identified below in this Section 1(b)(iii)&#160;&#160;(in any case, the
applicable incentive plan pursuant to which any LTIP Award is granted, the
&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Plan</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;Each
LTIP Award shall be set forth in an award agreement between Executive and the
Company that is consistent with the terms and conditions contained in comparable
award agreements provided to other key executives of the
Company&#160;&#160;(each such agreement, an &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Award Agreement</font>&#8221;).
</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 162pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(A)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Positive EBITDA
Awards</font>.&#160;&#160;During the first ninety days of each of calendar years
2010, 2011 and 2012, subject to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section 1(b)(iii)(D)</font>
and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section
1(b)(iii)(F)(3)</font> below, the Company shall grant to Executive under a Plan
a number of restricted stock units (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RSUs</font>&#8221;) or restricted shares
(as determined by the Company at the time of grant) determined by dividing
$800,000 by the Fair Market Value (as defined in the applicable Plan) (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Fair Market Value</font>&#8221;) of a share
of the Company&#8217;s common stock as of January 2 of the calendar year in which such
award is granted (or, if January 2 is not a Business Day (as defined below), the
first Business Day thereafter) (such awards, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">PEA Grants</font>&#8221;), subject to
Executive&#8217;s continued employment with the Company through the applicable grant
date.&#160;&#160;&#160;Each PEA Grant shall vest, subject to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections 1(b)(iii)(E) and
(F)</font> below, on February 1 of the calendar year immediately following the
year in which such PEA Grant is made (any date on which a PEA Grant vests, a
&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">PEA Vesting Date</font>&#8221;),
subject to&#160;&#160;(i) the Company attaining positive EBITDA (as defined
below), as determined by the Compensation Committee, during the thirteen-month
period beginning on January 1 of the year of grant, and (ii) Executive&#8217;s
continued employment with the Company through the applicable February 1 vesting
date.&#160;&#160;&#160;If PEA Grants are made in the form of RSUs, any such PEA
Grants that vest in accordance herewith shall be settled in whole shares of
Company common stock as soon as practicable after the applicable PEA Vesting
Date, but in no event later than the March 15 immediately following the
applicable PEA Vesting Date, with the actual settlement or payment date
determined in the Company&#8217;s sole discretion.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 162pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(B)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">EBITDA Target
Awards</font>.&#160;&#160;During the first ninety days of each of calendar years
2010, 2011 and 2012, subject to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section 1(b)(iii)(D)</font>
and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section
1(b)(iii)(F)(3)</font> below, the Company shall grant to Executive under a Plan
a number of RSUs or restricted shares (as determined by the Company at the time
of grant) determined by dividing $500,000 by the Fair Market Value of a share of
the Company&#8217;s common stock as of January 2 of the calendar year in which such
award is granted (or, if January 2 is not a Business Day, the first Business Day
thereafter) (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ETA
Grants</font>&#8221;), subject to Executive&#8217;s continued employment with the Company
through the applicable grant date.&#160;&#160;The Compensation Committee shall
establish in writing an EBITDA target applicable to each ETA Grant during the
first ninety days of the calendar year in which such ETA Grant is made (and, in
any event, upon or prior to making such grant).&#160;&#160;&#160;The ETA Grants
shall vest, subject to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections 1(b)(iii)(E) and
(F)</font> below, as to 50% of the ETA Grant multiplied by the applicable ETA
Performance Percentage (as defined below) on February 1 of each of the first two
calendar years immediately following the year of grant, subject, in each case,
to Executive&#8217;s continued employment through such date (any date on
which</font></div><br>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div><br>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">an ETA
Grant vests, an &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ETA Vesting
Date</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">ETA</font> <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Performance Percentage</font>&#8221; with
respect to each ETA Grant shall mean (i) zero if the applicable EBITDA target is
attained at less than 80%, (ii) 50% if the applicable EBITDA target is attained
at 80%, (iii) 100% if the applicable EBITDA target is attained at 100% or
greater, and (iv) a linear pro ration between 50 &#8211; 100% if the applicable EBITDA
target is attained between 80% - 100%&#160;&#160;(for example, the ETA
Performance Percentage will equal 87.5% upon attainment of 95% of the applicable
EBITDA target).&#160;&#160;If ETA Grants are made in the form of RSUs, any such
ETA Grants that vest in accordance herewith shall be settled in whole shares of
Company common stock as soon as practicable after the applicable ETA Vesting
Date, but in no event later than the March 15 immediately following the
applicable ETA Vesting Date, with the actual settlement date determined in the
Company&#8217;s sole discretion.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 162pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(C)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Additional Performance
Awards</font>.&#160;&#160;Subject to Executive&#8217;s continued employment with the
Company through&#160;&#160;each such grant date and further subject <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section 1(b)(iii)(D)</font>
and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section
1(b)(iii)(F)(3)</font> below, the Company shall make the following grants of
additional performance awards under a Plan to Executive (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Additional
Grants</font>&#8221;):</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 72pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">2010
      Grant</font>.&#160;&#160;During the first ninety days of calendar year
      2010, the Company shall grant to Executive an Additional Grant that
      provides the opportunity to earn up to $500,000, payable as soon as
      practicable after February 1, 2013, but in no event later than March
      15<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">,</font>
      2013.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 72pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">2011
      Grants</font>.&#160;&#160;During the first ninety days of calendar year
      2011, the Company shall grant to Executive two Additional Grants, each
      providing the opportunity to earn up to $500,000, payable as soon as
      practicable after February 1, 2013 and February 1, 2014, respectively, but
      in no event later than March 15, 2013 and March 15, 2014,
      respectively.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">2012
      Grants</font>.&#160;&#160;During the first ninety days of calendar year

      providing the opportunity to earn up to $500,000, payable as soon as
      practicable after February 1, 2013, February 1, 2014 and February 1, 2015,
      respectively, but in no event later than March 15, 2013, March 15, 2014
      and March 15, 2015, respectively.</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font></div>

            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">2013

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

            <td>
              <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic">2014

            </td>
